channel.title: NEED help with slayer =']
channel.description: Hello everyone, currently im coding on my server and i need some help with slayer. Does anyone know when a monster is killed how it could also add into the slayer skill? so for eg, if i was to kill a crawling hand.. is there anyway in which when i kill it .. it can give exp onto slayer? if anyone knows can you pls reply back asap ty :D
